quote: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: Diversity: the art of thinking independently together.
name: Malcolm Forbes

quote: My mother told me to be a lady. And for her, that meant be your own person, be independent.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: The American Dream is independence and being able to create that dream for yourself.
name: Marsha Blackburn

quote: Nothing is more precious than independence and liberty.
name: Ho Chi Minh

quote: It was by one Union that we achieved our independence and liberties, and by it alone can they be maintained.
name: James Monroe

quote: Solitude is independence.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being with an independent will.
name: Charlotte Bronte

quote: Independence is happiness.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Mickey Mouse is, to me, a symbol of independence. He was a means to an end.
name: Walt Disney

quote: Originality is independence, not rebellion; it is sincerity, not antagonism.
name: George Henry Lewes

quote: I was born with a fierce need for independence.
name: Michelle Williams

quote: The new electronic independence re-creates the world in the image of a global village.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right.
name: Brigham Young

quote: What is it that makes us trust our judges? Their independence in office and manner of appointment.
name: John Marshall

quote: What then is freedom? The power to live as one wishes.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: I have an independent streak. You know, it's kind of hard to tell a independent woman what to do.
name: Betty Ford

quote: Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it.
name: John D. Rockefeller

quote: The beauty of independence, departure, actions that rely on themselves.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Independence doesn't mean you decide the way you want.
name: Stephen Breyer

quote: The most dangerous thing in the world is the sin of self-reliance and the stupor of worldliness.
name: John Piper

quote: I admire the courage and self-reliance it takes to start your own business and make it succeed.
name: Martha Stewart

quote: The independence of all political and other bother is a happiness.
name: Rutherford B. Hayes

quote: There is a core independence and dignity you get when you control your own time.
name: Travis Kalanick

quote: Nationality is the miracle of political independence; race is the principle of physical analogy.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Self-determination could mean independence, confederacy, federal and autonomy.
name: Jalal Talabani

quote: Throughout the day no time for memorandums now. Go ahead! Liberty and independence forever.
name: Davy Crockett

quote: The virtues of science are skepticism and independence of thought.
name: Walter Gilbert

quote: The world is independent of my will.
name: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: The scale of 'Independence Day' is much more than 'Stargate.'
name: Dean Devlin

quote: What you get free costs too much.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: The United Nations is designed to make possible lasting freedom and independence for all its members.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: Injustice in the end produces independence.
name: Voltaire

quote: There is an inverse relationship between reliance on the state and self-reliance.
name: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quote: Africans require, want, the franchise on the basis of one man one vote. They want political independence.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Independence? That's middle class blasphemy. We are all dependent on one another, every soul of us on earth.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Part of your heritage in this society is the opportunity to become financially independent.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Divorce is a declaration of independence with only two signers.
name: Gerald F. Lieberman

quote: There is no more independence in politics than there is in jail.
name: Will Rogers

quote: We are totally committed to ending partition and to creating the conditions for unity and independence.
name: Gerry Adams

quote: It's so important to have that independence. You know it yourself: Everyone needs evenings of their own.
name: Olivia Wilde

quote: Independence did not mean chauvinism and narrow nationalism.
name: Said Musa

quote: Independence means you decide according to the law and the facts.
name: Stephen Breyer

quote: The toddler craves independence, but he fears desertion.
name: Dorothy Corkille Briggs

quote: We do need a return to individual integrity, self-reliance, and old-fashioned gumption. We really do.
name: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: Nature has never read the Declaration of Independence. It continues to make us unequal.
name: Will Durant

quote: Without moral and intellectual independence, there is no anchor for national independence.
name: David Ben-Gurion

quote: The love of independence and dislike of unjust treatment is the source of a thousand virtues.
name: William Godwin

quote: Impatience is the mark of independence, not of bondage.
name: Marianne Moore

quote: It's important for women to work. They need to keep their independence, to keep earning and being challenged.
name: Tamara Mellon

quote: The Declaration of Independence is a sacred part of American history.
name: Paul Gillmor

quote: People seem to think that life began with the achievement of personal independence.
name: Katharine Anthony

quote: Mad, adj. Affected with a high degree of intellectual independence.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Our military might is the guarantor of Russia's security and independence.
name: Vladimir Putin

quote: I have grown up alone. I've taken care of myself. I worked, earned money and was independent at 18.
name: Ingrid Bergman

quote: The independence project in Catalonia is... a peaceful revolution, carried out in suit, shirt, and tie.
name: Carles Puigdemont

quote: I do need my independence. I have to have that.
name: Carol Vorderman

quote: Independence is a very subjective assessment.
name: P. Chidambaram

quote: The possession of land seems to be a greater gratification to the pride and independence of men.
name: George Richards Minot

quote: I don't have luxurious tastes or great needs, but my independence is worth a lot to me.
name: Emmanuel Macron

quote: Every year thousands of Americans mistakenly refer to Cinco de Mayo as Mexico's Independence Day.
name: Joe Baca

quote: The most unpardonable sin in society is independence of thought.
name: Emma Goldman

quote: It took us in this country 11 years to get from the Declaration of Independence to the Constitution.
name: Mitch McConnell

quote: Energy independence and energy security are really two different things.
name: Rex Tillerson

quote: The Fed's independence is critical.
name: Ben Bernanke

quote: Whatever we do toward energy independence has to be done in the context of using less resources.
name: Alan Mulally

quote: Stand-up is my favorite thing I've ever done. There's so much independence.
name: Rita Rudner

quote: It is not the greatness of a man's means that makes him independent, so much as the smallness of his wants.
name: William Cobbett

quote: Britain is characterized not just by its independence but, above all, by its openness.
name: David Cameron

quote: The same independence that got me into trouble in high school got me praise in college.
name: Alan Dershowitz

quote: I had fought for my independence and fought for my freedom to do as I chose.
name: Kris Kristofferson

quote: You cannot build character and courage by taking away a man's initiative and independence.
name: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: You cannot build character and courage by destroying men's initiative and independence.
name: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: I know this independence is what people like most about my brand.
name: Raf Simons

quote: I work hard, I make my own living and I love it. I like having financial independence.
name: Salma Hayek

quote: Every American must be guaranteed dignity and independence in their retirement.
name: Jan Schakowsky

quote: For me, the biggest thing with money has always been independence - just the biggest.
name: Monica Seles

quote: Work means independence. It allowed me to shape my life on so many levels.
name: Natalie Massenet

quote: Energy conservation is the foundation of energy independence.
name: Tom Allen

quote: We must first and foremost defend Hungary's independence and sovereignty, and, if needed, we must regain it.
name: Viktor Orban

quote: Men say they love independence in a woman, but they don't waste a second demolishing it brick by brick.
name: Candice Bergen

quote: I cannot compromise or inhibit my independence.
name: Walter Annenberg

quote: I'm not making any secret of the fact I still believe in independence. We'll continue to argue the case.
name: Nicola Sturgeon

quote: I think that there is a relatively small number of people who are pushing for independence in Taiwan.
name: Fred Thompson

quote: Declaring independence was the most traumatic decision I had to live up to. Because I didn't want to do it.
name: Ian Smith

quote: Energy independence is very important to me.
name: Tomi Lahren

quote: I've always been an independent person, but that independence was in the setting of security.
name: Patricia Heaton

quote: As for 'Independence Day,' we never intended to do any films in that series beyond the first one.
name: Dean Devlin

quote: 'Independence Day,' ever since we did it, there's been enormous pressure to follow it up.
name: Dean Devlin

quote: We moved to Zimbabwe when I was five, some years after Zimbabwe had gained independence.
name: Danai Gurira

quote: I think boarding school does give you an independence.
name: Deirdre O'Kane

quote: I'm totally committed to the cause of individuality. That's the only thing I stand by: independence.
name: Juliana Hatfield

quote: We must do our utmost to preserve our British ally's strategic independence from Europe.
name: Richard Perle

quote: There are beautiful words in the Bible and in our pledges and the Declaration of Independence.
name: Louis Gossett, Jr.

quote: It's one of the things I respect about Time Warner and Turner: their understanding of CNN's independence.
name: Jeff Zucker

quote: There's no alternative to Catalan independence.
name: Carles Puigdemont

quote: We show each day that we are prepared to act as an independence state... Not just in exceptional moments.
name: Carles Puigdemont

quote: Fox was interested in a different title to 'Independence Day.'
name: Bill Pullman

quote: It's great that with the Internet, there has come this sense of creative independence.
name: Tavi Gevinson

quote: The BBC is a victim of its own independence.
name: Graham Norton

quote: Swaziland is a small part of south-east Africa, the last country in the continent to gain its independence.
name: Richard Grant

quote: Robert Treat Paine was a signer of the Declaration of Independence.
name: Treat Williams

quote: I'm a big fan of community, and I think independence is over-rated.
name: Sally Phillips

quote: To start with, for example this year, 2004, is the bicentennial of Haitian independence.
name: Edwidge Danticat

quote: The independence of the economic sphere was a tenet of faith with Liberalism.
name: Francis Parker Yockey

quote: My government has promised to comprehensively respect the independence of the judiciary.
name: Victor Ponta

quote: We must develop energy independence; we must Make It In America.
name: John Garamendi

quote: Frankly, I love my independence too much to give it up.
name: Akkineni Nagarjuna

quote: I'm lucky because I remember my dad showing me 'Independence Day,' and I loved it.
name: Maika Monroe

quote: Instead of being taught independence, energy, and enterprise, our youth today is taught to look for security.
name: B. Carroll Reece

quote: It is critical that special counsels have the independence and resources they need to lead investigations.
name: Thom Tillis

quote: Like millions of Scots, I've agonised over whether to go for independence or remain with the Union.
name: Rory Bremner

quote: I'm for economic independence.
name: Charles Evers

quote: When India got independence, entrepreneurs were seen as a bad lot, as people who would exploit.
name: Nandan Nilekani

quote: At independence, Tanzania had 350,000 elephants... in 1987, there were only 55,000 elephants left.
name: Jakaya Kikwete

quote: As a filmmaker, one tends to want to evolve evermore towards a place of independence.
name: Bennett Miller

quote: There's no such thing as an independent person.
name: Peter Jennings

quote: I think that initial independence is very important; that's what being an entrepreneur is all about.
name: Jon Oringer

quote: In January 1776, Thomas Paine issued 'Common Sense,' advocating independence from Great Britain.
name: Mike Crapo

quote: Football was the best route to obtain my independence.
name: John David Washington

quote: As I said, men value their independence in a weird way, above practically everything.
name: George Weinberg

quote: But since independence, Gabon is one of the few countries in Central Africa that enjoys peace and stability.
name: Omar Bongo

quote: I want to emphasize the fact that the independence of Kosovo should and will be recognized.
name: Ibrahim Rugova

quote: A majority in all parties do, I think, want to see local government recover its old vigour and independence.
name: Ferdinand Mount

quote: I built my entire life on the idea of independence.
name: Valerie Trierweiler

quote: My feeling is that maintaining financial independence is also a healthy way to keep my feet on the ground.
name: Valerie Trierweiler

quote: I just like my independence and freedom to come and go and not have an entourage.
name: Fred Eychaner

quote: When we celebrate American independence, we are celebrating the best sense of an idea, a process in process.
name: Rowan Ricardo Phillips

quote: Journalists prize independence - not teamwork.
name: Ken Auletta

quote: Independence is not a whim or an ambition. It is the necessary condition of our survival as an ethnic group.
name: Aslan Maskhadov

quote: I've tried to maintain my independence in Congress. Sometimes that has meant opposing my own party leaders.
name: Collin C. Peterson

quote: I believe that Greenland will achieve independence during the time I am still active in politics.
name: Aleqa Hammond

quote: In July, 1892, fate suddenly granted me financial independence.
name: Carl Spitteler

quote: I am dying, but with a strong hope and persuasion that my country will gain her independence.
name: David Wooster
